append.xpath: /entity_classes/entity_class [starts-with(@name,'zombieJoe') or (starts-with(@name,'zombieSteve')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieTomClark')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieBurnt')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieSpider')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieBoe')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieInmate')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieMoe')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieYo')) or (starts-with(@name,'zombieSteveCrawler')) ]
